name: Transform (MKSMILEY)
description:
Welcome to Transform! This is a prototype game made for My First Game Jam Summer 2020. Just unzip and run the executable to play.

Controls:
 - WASD to Move
 - 1 to change to Jump Form
 - 2 to change to Speed Form
 - 3 to change to Glide Form
 - ESC to open menu

Instructions:
 - Reach the level clear zone!
 - The first level only needs the Jump Form and will get you used to how it works.
 - The second level only needs the Speed Form and will get you used to how it works.
 - The third level only needs the Glide Form and will get you used to how it works.
 - The fourth level will require you to change forms to complete.

Objects:
 - Red objects will make you restart the level if you touch them.
 - Green objects will dissapear after a moment if you touch them.
 - Blue objects will let make you climb up them if you are in the Glide Form.
 * Blue objects are fickle. You may need to back up and touch them again if they
   do not work the first time.

Made by Marko Smiljanic
